Class PrescriptionController

java.lang.Object
control.prescription.PrescriptionController
public class PrescriptionController extends Object
Controller for managing prescription-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • createPrescription

      public static Prescription createPrescription(String apptId) throws InvalidInputException
      Creates a new Prescription for the specified appointment.
      Parameters:
      apptId - The ID of the appointment.
      Returns:
      The created Prescription.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the appointment ID is null or empty.

    • getPrescriptionById

      public static Prescription getPrescriptionById(String prescriptionId) throws EntityNotFoundException, InvalidInputException
      Retrieves a Prescription by its ID.
      Parameters:
      prescriptionId - The ID of the prescription.
      Returns:
      The Prescription object.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If the prescription is not found.
      InvalidInputException - If the prescription ID is invalid.

    • getPrescriptionByAppt

      public static Prescription getPrescriptionByAppt(Appointment appt) throws EntityNotFoundException, InvalidInputException
      Retrieves a Prescription associated with the specified appointment.
      Parameters:
      appt - The appointment to find the prescription for.
      Returns:
      The Prescription object.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If the prescription is not found.
      InvalidInputException - If the appointment is null.

    • getActivePrescriptions

      public static List<Prescription> getActivePrescriptions()
      Retrieves a list of active prescriptions.
      Returns:
      A list of active prescriptions.

    • getPrescriptionItems

      public static List<PrescriptionItem> getPrescriptionItems(Prescription prescription) throws InvalidInputException
      Retrieves all PrescriptionItems for the specified prescription.
      Parameters:
      prescription - The prescription to get items for.
      Returns:
      A list of PrescriptionItems.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the prescription is null.

    • updatePrescriptionStatus

      public static Boolean updatePrescriptionStatus(Prescription prescription, boolean isActive) throws InvalidInputException
      Updates the active status of a prescription.
      Parameters:
      prescription - The prescription to update.
      isActive - The new active status.
      Returns:
      The updated active status.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the prescription is null.

    • updatePrescriptionStatusIfCompleted

      public static void updatePrescriptionStatusIfCompleted(String prescriptionId) throws InvalidInputException, EntityNotFoundException
      Updates the prescription status to inactive if all items have been dispensed.
      Parameters:
      prescriptionId - The ID of the prescription.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the prescription ID is invalid.
      EntityNotFoundException - If the prescription is not found.

    • cancelPrescription

      public static void cancelPrescription(Prescription prescription) throws InvalidInputException
      Cancels the specified prescription by setting its active status to false.
      Parameters:
      prescription - The prescription to cancel.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the prescription is null or already inactive.

    • checkCompleted

      public static Boolean checkCompleted(Prescription prescription) throws InvalidInputException
      Checks if all items in the prescription have been completed (no pending items).
      Parameters:
      prescription - The prescription to check.
      Returns:
      True if all items are completed, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the prescription is null.

    • deletePrescription

      public static void deletePrescription(Prescription prescription) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Deletes the specified prescription.
      Parameters:
      prescription - The prescription to delete.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If the prescription is not found.

    • updatePrescription

      public static void updatePrescription(Appointment appt, HashMap<String,List<Object>> updatedPrescribedMedication)
      Updates the prescription for a specific appointment by adding or modifying prescribed medications. If a prescription already exists for the appointment, it updates the prescribed items. If no prescription exists, a new prescription is created.
      Parameters:
      appt - The appointment for which the prescription needs to be updated.
      updatedPrescribedMedication - A map containing the updated prescribed medications, where each entry contains a medication ID as the key, and a list of objects as the value. The list contains the medication quantity at index 0 and the notes at index 1.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the input data is invalid, such as null or empty appointment or medication data.
      EntityNotFoundException - If the prescription or prescription items cannot be found.
